text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Nocturnal. Poisons zombies. Damages multiple zombies at the same time. Ignores shields.
$(br2)$(#bd951a)"I was in a dead-end job producing yeast spores for a bakery. Then Puff-shroom, told me about this great opportunity blasting zombies."

pages.title: 🧪 Ailment Family
pages.text: $(#25228d)Fume-shrooms shoot fumes that can pass through zombies.
